meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Luke McQuage Suzanne Vito Scott Lord Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7121.

div.div:
Scott Lord game 6.
Alex Trebek's audio was re-recorded when his voice recovered.

td.p: Luke McQuage, an engineer originally from Austin, Texas
Suzanne Vito, a writer from Albany, California
Scott Lord, a construction attorney from Santa Monica, California (whose 5-day cash winnings total $108,002)

tr.td: STATE OF THE ESTATE
(Alex: We'll give you the estate.)
MY LITTLE PONY NAMES
FOOD & DRINK
TECH SAVVY
BIOGRAPHIES
IN B__W

$3,300
Scheherazade')
